üöÄ A feature-rich **real-time chat application** built using **MERN + Socket.io**. Stay connected with seamless messaging, authentication, online status tracking, and more!  

üîó **Live Demo:** [Chat App](https://chat-app-lkot.onrender.com/)  

---

## ‚ú® Highlights  

üåü **Tech stack:** MERN + Socket.io + TailwindCSS + Daisy UI  
üéÉ **Authentication & Authorization** with JWT  
üëæ **Real-time messaging** with Socket.io  
üöÄ **Online user status tracking**  
üëå **Global state management** with Zustand  
üêû **Error handling** on both client and server  
‚≠ê **Free deployment walkthrough**  
‚è≥ **And much more!**  

---

## üîß Installation & Setup  

### 1Ô∏è‚É£ **Clone the Repository**  

```bash
git clone https://github.com/yourusername/chat-app.git
cd chat-app
```

### 2Ô∏è‚É£ ***Install Dependencies***

üîß Environment Setup
Before running the project, configure the required environment variables.

### 3Ô∏è‚É£ ***Set Up .env File***
Create a .env file in the server directory and add:
```bash
MONGODB_URI=your_mongodb_connection_string
PORT=5001
JWT_SECRET=your_jwt_secret

CLOUDINARY_CLOUD_NAME=your_cloudinary_cloud_name
CLOUDINARY_API_KEY=your_cloudinary_api_key
CLOUDINARY_API_SECRET=your_cloudinary_api_secret

NODE_ENV=development
```

### 4Ô∏è‚É£ ***Build the app***
```bash
npm run build
```
### 5Ô∏è‚É£ ***Start the app***
```bash
npm start
```
